channel.title: hugo on Troy Hamilton
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Troy Hamilton

item.title: All the hugs for Hugo
item.description: I am not a front end developer… 14 years in IT, I regret not learning more html/css/js. That negligence has brought me to this point. There’s a big difference between working with html files hosted in a load balanced IIS cluster versus building a site from scratch, tweaking it, making it look good, etc. Before Hugo I tried: Rolling my own with html 5 and css 3 - Way harder than it sounds [fail] Gatsby.
